query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Ora sen va per un secreto calle, 2 tra ’l muro de la terra e li martìri, 3 lo mio maestro, e io dopo le spalle.
query.result:
**English:**
1 Now he goes by a secret path, 2 between the wall of the city and the martyrs, 3 my master, and I behind his shoulders.
**Malay:**
1 Sekarang dia pergi melalui jalan rahasia, 2 di antara tembok kota dan para martir, 3 guruku, dan aku di belakang bahunya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 «O virtù somma, che per li empi giri 5 mi volvi», cominciai, «com’ a te piace, 6 parlami, e sodisfammi a’ miei disiri.
query.result:
**English:**
4 "O supreme virtue, who through the impious circles 5 turned me," I began, "as pleases you, 6 speak to me, and satisfy my desires.
**Malay:**
4 "Wahai kebajikan tertinggi, yang melalui lingkaran-lingkaran yang tidak saleh 5 memutarbalikkan aku," aku memulai, "seperti yang kauinginkan, 6 berbicaralah kepadaku, dan penuhilah hasratku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 La gente che per li sepolcri giace 8 potrebbesi veder? già son levati 9 tutt’ i coperchi, e nessun guardia face».
query.result:
**English:**
7 The people who lie in the sepulchers 8 could they be seen? Already they have risen, 9 all the lids, and no guard stands watch.
**Malay:**
7 Orang-orang yang terbaring di dalam kuburan 8 dapatkah mereka dilihat? Sudah terangkat 9 semua penutupnya, dan tidak ada penjaga yang mengawasi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 E quelli a me: «Tutti saran serrati 11 quando di Iosafàt qui torneranno 12 coi corpi che là sù hanno lasciati.
query.result:
**English:**
10 And those to me: "All will be gathered 11 when they return here to Jehoshaphat 12 with the bodies they left up there."
**Malay:**
10 Dan mereka kepadaku: "Semua akan berkumpul 11 ketika mereka kembali ke sini ke Yosafat 12 dengan tubuh yang mereka tinggalkan di atas sana."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Suo cimitero da questa parte hanno 14 con Epicuro tutti suoi seguaci, 15 che l’anima col corpo morta fanno.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Their cemetery on this side have 14 with Epicurus all his followers, 15 who make the soul die with the body.
**Malay:**
13 Kuburan mereka di sisi ini memiliki 14 bersama Epicurus semua pengikutnya, 15 yang membuat jiwa mati bersama tubuh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Però a la dimanda che mi faci 17 quinc’ entro satisfatto sarà tosto, 18 e al disio ancor che tu mi taci».
query.result:
**English:**
16 But to the question that you ask me 17 here within you will soon be satisfied, 18 and also to the desire that you keep silent about».
**Malay:**
16 Tetapi untuk pertanyaan yang kamu ajukan kepadaku 17 di sini di dalam kamu akan segera dipuaskan, 18 dan juga untuk keinginan yang kamu sembunyikan dariku».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 E io: «Buon duca, non tegno riposto 20 a te mio cuor se non per dicer poco, 21 e tu m’hai non pur mo a ciò disposto».
query.result:
**English:**
19 And I: "Good leader, I do not keep hidden 20 from you my heart except to say little, 21 and you have just now disposed me to this."
**Malay:**
19 Dan aku: "Pemimpin yang baik, aku tidak menyembunyikan 20 darimu hatiku kecuali untuk mengatakan sedikit, 21 dan kamu baru saja membuatku siap untuk ini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 «O Tosco che per la città del foco 23 vivo ten vai così parlando onesto, 24 piacciati di restare in questo loco.
query.result:
**English:**
22 "O Tuscan, who through the city of fire 23 go thus speaking so honestly, 24 please stay in this place.
**Malay:**
22 "Wahai orang Toskana, yang melalui kota api 23 hidup, pergilah dengan berbicara jujur, 24 sudilah untuk tinggal di tempat ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 La tua loquela ti fa manifesto 26 di quella nobil patrïa natio, 27 a la qual forse fui troppo molesto».
query.result:
**English:**
25 Your speech reveals 26 that you are a native of that noble fatherland 27 to which perhaps I was too troublesome.
**Malay:**
25 Tutur katamu menunjukkan 26 bahwa kamu berasal dari tanah air yang mulia itu, 27 yang mungkin telah terlalu menyusahkanmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Subitamente questo suono uscìo 29 d’una de l’arche; però m’accostai, 30 temendo, un poco più al duca mio.
query.result:
**English:**
28 Suddenly this sound came out 29 from one of the arches; therefore I approached, 30 fearing, a little closer to my guide.
**Malay:**
28 Tiba-tiba suara ini keluar 29 dari salah satu lengkungan; oleh karena itu aku mendekat, 30 dengan rasa takut, sedikit lebih dekat kepada pemanduku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Ed el mi disse: «Volgiti! Che fai? 32 Vedi là Farinata che s’è dritto: 33 da la cintola in sù tutto ’l vedrai».
query.result:
**English:**
31 And he said to me: "Turn around! What are you doing? 32 See Farinata there, who has risen up: 33 from the waist up, you will see him all."
**Malay:**
31 Dan dia berkata kepadaku: "Berbaliklah! Apa yang kamu lakukan? 32 Lihatlah Farinata di sana, yang telah bangkit: 33 dari pinggang ke atas, kamu akan melihatnya semua."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Io avea già il mio viso nel suo fitto; 35 ed el s’ergea col petto e con la fronte 36 com’ avesse l’inferno a gran dispitto.
query.result:
**English:**
34 I had already set my face toward its depths; 35 and it rose up with its chest and forehead 36 as if it held all of hell in great contempt.
**Malay:**
34 Aku telah menetapkan wajahku ke arah kedalamannya; 35 dan ia bangkit dengan dada dan dahinya 36 seolah-olah ia sangat membenci neraka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 E l’animose man del duca e pronte 38 mi pinser tra le sepulture a lui, 39 dicendo: «Le parole tue sien conte».
query.result:
**English:**
37 And the duke's eager and ready mind 38 led me among the sepulchers to him, 39 saying, "Your words will be a story to him."
**Malay:**
37 Dan pikiran sang duke yang bersemangat dan siap 38 membawaku di antara makam-makam kepadanya, 39 berkata, "Kata-katamu akan menjadi cerita baginya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Com’ io al piè de la sua tomba fui, 41 guardommi un poco, e poi, quasi sdegnoso, 42 mi dimandò: «Chi fuor li maggior tui?».
query.result:
**English:**
40 As I stood at the foot of his tomb, 41 he looked at me for a moment, and then, almost disdainfully, 42 he asked me: "Who were your greatest ancestors?".
**Malay:**
40 Ketika aku berdiri di kaki makamnya, 41 dia menatapku sejenak, lalu, hampir dengan nada menghina, 42 dia bertanya kepadaku: "Siapa nenek moyangmu yang terhebat?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 «S’ei fur cacciati, ei tornar d’ogne parte», 50 rispuos’ io lui, «l’una e l’altra fïata; 51 ma i vostri non appreser ben quell’ arte».
query.result:
**English:**
49 "If you were driven out, you can return from every side," 50 I answered him, "the first time and the second; 51 but your people did not learn that art well."
**Malay:**
49 "Jika kamu diusir, kamu dapat kembali dari setiap sisi," 50 jawabku kepadanya, "pertama kali dan kedua kali; 51 tetapi kaummu tidak mempelajari seni itu dengan baik."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Allor surse a la vista scoperchiata 53 un’ombra, lungo questa, infino al mento: 54 credo che s’era in ginocchie levata.
query.result:
**English:**
52 Then a shade rose into view, uncovered, 53 along this one, up to the chin: 54 I believe it had risen to its knees.
**Malay:**
52 Kemudian muncullah bayangan yang terlihat jelas, 53 di sepanjang yang ini, hingga ke dagu: 54 kurasa ia telah berlutut.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Dintorno mi guardò, come talento 56 avesse di veder s’altri era meco; 57 e poi che ’l sospecciar fu tutto spento,
58 piangendo disse: «Se per questo cieco 59 carcere vai per altezza d’ingegno, 60 mio figlio ov’ è? e perché non è teco?».
query.result:
**English:**
55 I looked around me, as if I had a desire 56 to see if anyone else was with me; 57 and after my suspicion was completely dispelled,
58 weeping, she said: “If through this blind 59 prison you go because of the height of your genius, 60 where is my son? And why is he not with you?”.
**Malay:**
55 Aku melihat sekelilingku, seolah-olah aku memiliki keinginan 56 untuk melihat apakah ada orang lain bersamaku; 57 dan setelah kecurigaanku benar-benar hilang,
58 sambil menangis, dia berkata: “Jika melalui penjara buta ini 59 kamu pergi karena ketinggian kecerdasanmu, 60 di mana anakku? Dan mengapa dia tidak bersamamu?”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 E io a lui: «Da me stesso non vegno: 62 colui ch’attende là, per qui mi mena 63 forse cui Guido vostro ebbe a disdegno».
query.result:
**English:**
61 And I to him: "I do not come of myself: 62 he who awaits there, for him he leads me, 63 perhaps your Guido held him in disdain."
**Malay:**
61 Dan aku kepadanya: "Aku tidak datang sendiri: 62 dia yang menunggu di sana, untuknya dia membawaku, 63 mungkin Guido kalian membencinya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Le sue parole e ’l modo de la pena 65 m’avean di costui già letto il nome; 66 però fu la risposta così piena.
query.result:
**English:**
64 His words and the manner of his punishment 65 had already revealed his name to me; 66 therefore my answer was so complete.
**Malay:**
64 Kata-katanya dan cara hukumannya 65 telah menunjukkan namanya kepadaku; 66 oleh karena itu jawabanku begitu lengkap.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Di sùbito drizzato gridò: «Come? 68 dicesti “elli ebbe”? non viv’ elli ancora? 69 non fiere li occhi suoi lo dolce lume?».
query.result:
**English:**
67 Suddenly he straightened up and shouted: "What? 68 You said 'he had'? Doesn't he still live? 69 Doesn't the sweet light strike his eyes?"
**Malay:**
67 Tiba-tiba dia menegakkan badan dan berteriak: "Apa? 68 Kau bilang 'dia punya'? Bukankah dia masih hidup? 69 Bukankah cahaya yang manis itu menerpa matanya?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Quando s’accorse d’alcuna dimora 71 ch’io facëa dinanzi a la risposta, 72 supin ricadde e più non parve fora.
query.result:
**English:**
70 When he noticed that I was making some delay 71 before answering him, 72 he fell back supine and was no longer visible.
**Malay:**
70 Ketika dia menyadari bahwa aku membuat beberapa penundaan 71 sebelum menjawabnya, 72 dia terjatuh terlentang dan tidak lagi terlihat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Ma non cinquanta volte fia raccesa 80 la faccia de la donna che qui regge, 81 che tu saprai quanto quell’ arte pesa.
query.result:
**English:**
79 But not fifty times will the face of the woman who rules here be rekindled, 80 before you will know how much that art weighs. 81
**Malay:**
79 Tetapi tidak lima puluh kali wajah wanita yang memerintah di sini akan dinyalakan kembali, 80 sebelum kamu akan tahu betapa beratnya seni itu. 81

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 E se tu mai nel dolce mondo regge, 83 dimmi: perché quel popolo è sì empio 84 incontr’ a’ miei in ciascuna sua legge?».
query.result:
**English:**
82 And if you ever reign in the sweet world, 83 tell me: why are those people so wicked 84 against mine in each of their laws?”.
**Malay:**
82 Dan jika kamu pernah memerintah di dunia yang manis, 83 katakan padaku: mengapa orang-orang itu begitu jahat 84 terhadap bangsaku dalam setiap hukum mereka?”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Ond’ io a lui: «Lo strazio e ’l grande scempio 86 che fece l’Arbia colorata in rosso, 87 tal orazion fa far nel nostro tempio».
query.result:
**English:**
85 Then I said to him: "The slaughter and the great havoc 86 that turned the Arbia red with blood, 87 cause such a prayer to be said in our temple."
**Malay:**
85 Lalu aku berkata kepadanya: "Pembantaian dan malapetaka besar 86 yang membuat Arbia berwarna merah, 87 menyebabkan doa seperti itu diucapkan di kuil kita."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Poi ch’ebbe sospirando il capo mosso, 89 «A ciò non fu’ io sol», disse, «né certo 90 sanza cagion con li altri sarei mosso.
query.result:
**English:**
88 After he had moved his head with a sigh, 89 "I was not alone in this," he said, "nor certainly 90 would I have moved with the others without a reason.
**Malay:**
88 Setelah dia menggerakkan kepalanya sambil mendesah, 89 "Aku tidak sendirian dalam hal ini," katanya, "dan tentu saja 90 aku tidak akan bergerak bersama yang lain tanpa alasan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Ma fu’ io solo, là dove sofferto 92 fu per ciascun di tòrre via Fiorenza, 93 colui che la difesi a viso aperto».
query.result:
**English:**
91 But I was alone, there where each one of the 92 towers of Florence suffered, 93 he who defended it openly.
**Malay:**
91 Tetapi aku sendirian, di sana di mana setiap 92 menara Florence menderita, 93 dia yang mempertahankannya secara terbuka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 «Deh, se riposi mai vostra semenza», 95 prega’ io lui, «solvetemi quel nodo 96 che qui ha ’nviluppata mia sentenza.
query.result:
**English:**
94 “Ah, if you ever bring your seed to rest,” 95 I begged him, “untie for me that knot 96 that has entangled my judgment here.
**Malay:**
94 “Ah, jika kamu pernah menenangkan benihmu,” 95 aku memohon kepadanya, “uraikan bagiku simpul itu 96 yang telah membelit keputusanku di sini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 El par che voi veggiate, se ben odo, 98 dinanzi quel che ’l tempo seco adduce, 99 e nel presente tenete altro modo».
query.result:
**English:**
97 The pair that you see, if I hear correctly, 98 are in front of what time brings with it, 99 and in the present they hold another way.
**Malay:**
97 Pasangan yang kamu lihat, jika aku mendengar dengan benar, 98 berada di depan apa yang dibawa oleh waktu, 99 dan di masa sekarang mereka memegang cara yang lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 «Noi veggiam, come quei c’ha mala luce, 101 le cose», disse, «che ne son lontano; 102 cotanto ancor ne splende il sommo duce.
query.result:
**English:**
100 "We see, like those who have bad light, 101 the things," he said, "that are far from us; 102 so much still shines the supreme leader.
**Malay:**
100 "Kami melihat, seperti mereka yang memiliki cahaya yang buruk, 101 hal-hal," katanya, "yang jauh dari kami; 102 begitu banyak masih bersinar pemimpin tertinggi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Quando s’appressano o son, tutto è vano 104 nostro intelletto; e s’altri non ci apporta, 105 nulla sapem di vostro stato umano.
query.result:
**English:**
103 When they draw near or are present, all is vain 104 our intellect; and if others do not bring us news, 105 we know nothing of your human state.
**Malay:**
103 Ketika mereka mendekat atau hadir, semuanya sia-sia 104 kecerdasan kita; dan jika orang lain tidak membawa kita berita, 105 kita tidak tahu apa-apa tentang keadaan manusia Anda.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Però comprender puoi che tutta morta 107 fia nostra conoscenza da quel punto 108 che del futuro fia chiusa la porta».
query.result:
**English:**
106 However, you can understand that all our knowledge will be dead 107 from that point on, 108 because the door to the future will be closed.
**Malay:**
106 Namun, kamu dapat memahami bahwa semua pengetahuan kita akan mati 107 sejak saat itu, 108 karena pintu menuju masa depan akan tertutup.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 E già ’l maestro mio mi richiamava; 116 per ch’i’ pregai lo spirto più avaccio 117 che mi dicesse chi con lu’ istava.
query.result:
**English:**
115 And already my master was calling me; 116 therefore I begged the spirit more quickly 117 to tell me who was staying with him.
**Malay:**
115 Dan sudah tuanku memanggilku; 116 oleh karena itu aku memohon kepada roh itu lebih cepat 117 untuk memberitahuku siapa yang tinggal bersamanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Dissemi: «Qui con più di mille giaccio: 119 qua dentro è ’l secondo Federico 120 e ’l Cardinale; e de li altri mi taccio».
query.result:
**English:**
118 He said to me: “Here with more than a thousand I freeze: 119 here within is the second Frederick 120 and the Cardinal; and of the others I am silent”.
**Malay:**
118 Katanya kepadaku: “Di sini dengan lebih dari seribu aku membeku: 119 di dalam sini adalah Frederick yang kedua 120 dan sang Kardinal; dan yang lainnya tidak kukatakan”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Indi s’ascose; e io inver’ l’antico 122 poeta volsi i passi, ripensando 123 a quel parlar che mi parea nemico.
query.result:
**English:**
121 Then he hid himself; and I turned my steps toward the ancient poet, 122 thinking again about that speech which seemed hostile to me.
**Malay:**
121 Kemudian dia menyembunyikan dirinya; dan aku mengalihkan langkahku ke arah penyair kuno, 122 memikirkan kembali tentang ucapan yang menurutku memusuhiku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Elli si mosse; e poi, così andando, 125 mi disse: «Perché se’ tu sì smarrito?». 126 E io li sodisfeci al suo dimando.
query.result:
**English:**
124 She moved; and then, as we went on, 125 she said to me: "Why are you so lost?". 126 And I satisfied her request.
**Malay:**
124 Dia bergerak; dan kemudian, ketika kami melanjutkan perjalanan, 125 dia berkata kepadaku: "Mengapa kamu begitu tersesat?". 126 Dan aku memenuhi permintaannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 «La mente tua conservi quel ch’udito 128 hai contra te», mi comandò quel saggio; 129 «e ora attendi qui», e drizzò ’l dito:
130 «quando sarai dinanzi al dolce raggio 131 di quella il cui bell’ occhio tutto vede, 132 da lei saprai di tua vita il vïaggio».
query.result:
**English:**
127 "Let your mind retain what you have heard 128 against yourself," that sage commanded me; 129 "and now wait here," and he pointed his finger:
130 "when you will be before the sweet radiance 131 of her whose beautiful eye sees everything, 132 from her you will know the journey of your life."
**Malay:**
127 "Biarkan pikiranmu mengingat apa yang telah kamu dengar 128 terhadap dirimu," perintah orang bijak itu kepadaku; 129 "dan sekarang tunggu di sini," dan dia mengacungkan jarinya:
130 "ketika kamu berada di hadapan cahaya lembut 131 dari dia yang mata cantiknya melihat segalanya, 132 darinya kamu akan tahu perjalanan hidupmu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Appresso mosse a man sinistra il piede: 134 lasciammo il muro e gimmo inver’ lo mezzo 135 per un sentier ch’a una valle fiede,
136 che ’nfin là sù facea spiacer suo lezzo.
query.result:
**English:**
133 Then he moved his foot to the left: 134 we left the wall and went towards the middle 135 along a path that leads to a valley,
136 which made its stench unpleasant all the way up there.
**Malay:**
133 Kemudian dia menggerakkan kakinya ke kiri: 134 kami meninggalkan tembok dan pergi ke tengah 135 melalui jalan setapak yang menuju ke lembah,
136 yang baunya tidak sedap sampai ke atas sana.
